IBM Commerce South Eastern(US)
User Group meeting
October 21 st , 2015 at 2:00 PM EST
Join Today
 
LOCATIONS Check out our New Locations for latest updates | Check it Out!!
 
 
The IBM Commerce South Eastern(US) User Group provides a forum for clients and thought leaders to share ideas and discuss how they are using, and benefiting from, the features and capabilities available from IBM's Commerce software offerings, which include e-Commerce, Marketing, Analytics, Payments, Procurement, and B2B Integration solutions. With the holiday season coming up, now the time is ripe for organizations to ensure that their commerce operations and in full flow, scaling reliably, to ensure a wonderful customer experience.
 
Join us on October 21st, 2015(Wednesday) from 2 PM onwards at our Atlanta Digital Transformation Campus, as IBM experts, thought leaders and commerce implementors come together to discuss the challenges and initiatives around Commerce, B2B Integration, Marketing, Analytics and Order Management. Learn more about the next releases of the IBM Technology Stack and also gain deep insights into the product roadmap and future. To match the seasonal needs, we will also have roundtables and sessions dedicated to dicuss about how various organizations are combating the massive scale needs for the Holiday Season, covering everything from campaign management, user experience, scalability of operations and how analytics might play a major role in all this.
 
For more information please feel free to contact us at 1-678-509-8620
